Sentencas: In this study, the influence of CeO2, Nd2O3, Sm2O3 and Gd2O3 on various properties of the melt -quench route derived SrO-CaO-ZnO-B2O3-SiO2 glass have been investigated.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: Both the precursor glasses and heat treated glasses are characterized by dilatometry, differential scanning calorimetry (DSC), X-ray diffraction (XRD), field emission scanning electron microscopy (FESEM), Fourier transformed infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) and X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS).
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: The density and coefficient of thermal expansion of the glasses varies in the range 3.557-3.804 g cm(-3) and 10.5-11.2 x 10(-6)K(-1) (50-800 degrees C) respectively.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: Decrease in crystallization tendency with increase in cationic field strength of the ions is well supported by the increasing crystallization activation energy of the glasses calculated by Kissinger, Augis-Bennett and Ozawa models.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: XPS study revealed the presence of both Ce3+ and Ce4+ ions and an increase in characteristic binding energy of the respective rare earth elements from their core level studies.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: The Knoop hardness of the glasses varies in the range 6.03-6.28 GPa.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: The glass transition, glass softening and crystallization temperature; density and hardness of the glasses increased with increase in cationic field strength of the incorporated ions.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant

Sentencas: The thermomechanical properties of the Gd2O3 containing glass advocate its applicability as the most promising sealant in solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Influence of Ce, Nd, Sm and Gd oxides on the properties of alkaline-earth borosilicate glass sealant
